mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.email,b.book_name,b.book_code,bm.rent_date,bm.return_date,bm.reserve_date FROM member m,book b,book_management bm WHERE m.id = bm.id AND bm.book_code = b.book_code AND bm.id=#{id} AND bm.book_management_code=#{book_management_code}

SELECT b.book_code,book_name,book_author,book_publish,book_image,TO_CHAR(return_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS return_date,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reserve_date FROM book b,book_management bm WHERE b.book_code = bm.book_code AND book_management_code = (SELECT MAX(book_management_code) FROM book_management WHERE book_code = #{book_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET rent_yn='y' WHERE book_code=#{book_code}
UPDATE book SET reserve_yn='y' WHERE book_code=#{book_code}
